page.title: 04Village Shop/ Post Office
page.content: Mr.Folwell owns the village shop near the Green.The opening hours are from 9am. to 12.30pm. and from 2pm. to 5pm. The shop is open from Monday to Friday and Saturday morning.It is a general grocery shop with daily newspapers, magasines and comics.He makes wooden toys for sale.The shop is part of his house.He has a large brass name plate on the side of his house. Mrs. Collington runs the Sub-Post Office in her house which is in Chapel Lane. She has kept the P.O. for a year.There are lots of posters on the walls.She has many leaflets explaining the different kinds of P.O.services. She cannot sell a car or a gun licence.You can buy gift cards from her. The opening hours are 9am.to 12o' clock and from 2pm.to 5pm.She is not open on a Thursday afternoon.
